protocol.name: P-G5759-1
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown at 21C, in darkness and tissue was collected before a 30 min red light treatment

protocol.name: P-G5759-2
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized and plated on 1/2 Murashige Skoog (MS) medium containing 1% sucrose  without 220 ¼g/ml lincomycin.

protocol.name: P-G5759-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted with the RNeasy kit (Qiagen; Hilden, Germany)

protocol.name: P-G5759-5
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized and plated on 1/2 Murashige Skoog (MS) medium containing 1% sucrose  with 220 ¼g/ml lincomycin.

protocol.name: P-G5759-6
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown at 21C, in darkness and tissue was collected after a 30 min red light treatment
